DESCRIPTION: Manage and configure Hope's Anti-Alt add-on.
EXAMPLE:
{{prefix}}anti-alt enable **- to activate the addon**
{{prefix}}anti-alt disable **- to disable the addon**
{{prefix}}anti-alt add** - to add a user to the add-on whitelist**
{{prefix}}anti-alt remove ** - to remove a user from the add-on whitelist**
{{prefix}}anti-alt limit** - to set the limit of days allowed for an alt account on the server**
{{prefix}}anti-alt punishment** - to pick the action fired towards the alt**
{{prefix}}anti-alt localts** - to find all alt accounts on the server by the query provided**
{{prefix}}anti-alt locjoin** - to find alts accounts on the server based on join date**
